tag_line: Making The Impossible Possible. Using 1's and 0's.
intro_tagline: Mission-driven full-stack and blockchain developer, passionate about building robust systems, elegant interfaces, and shaping the decentralized future.
subTitle: Problem solving is what makes me unique.
favorites_quote: Willingness to take intelligient risks in the pursuit of your clearly defined goals, put you on a greater side of life. Enabling you to archive the same level of success in 1 or 2 years, which may take other people10 or 20 years to archieve, if lessed focused.
bio_desc: As a software engineer and graduate of IIIT Guwahati, I thrive at the intersection of thoughtful architecture and user experience. I love transforming complex ideas into scalable, real-world applications—from secure backend systems to intuitive frontends to on-chain logic. I’m driven by curiosity, craftsmanship, and the belief that well-built software can meaningfully move the world forward.
